scale-max-characters.name: Max Characters
scale-max-characters.description: Max amount of characters you can type for input. (this mod doesnt add scale hack so setting it really high is kinda pointless but sure ig)

siderbar-menu-enabled.name: Enable Scale Lock Menu
siderbar-menu-enabled.description: Adds scale lock to a side menu.

siderbar-position.name: Siderbar Side
siderbar-position.description: Also applies to copy/paste menu. True for right, false for left.

better-lock-enabled.name: Enable New Scale Lock Button
better-lock-enabled.description: Uses the lock button from the sidebar menu normally aswell.

lock-use-sprites.name: Use Sprites
lock-use-sprites.description: Use sprites as textures instead of text

x-y-shortcuts-enabled.name: X/Y Shortcuts
x-y-shortcuts-enabled.description: If false, removes X and Y scale shortcuts and replaces them XY.

shortcut-amount.name: Shortcuts
shortcut-amount.description: Amount of scale shortcuts to have.

scale-copy-paste-menu.name: Enable Copy Paste Menu
scale-copy-paste-menu.description: Enables the 'siderbar menu' and adds the copy paste buttons to it instead of at the top.

copy-paste-use-sprites.name: Use Sprites
copy-paste-use-sprites.description: Use sprites as textures instead of text
